channel.title: Noob help!
channel.description:
Client: Testscape
Well i did some updates on testscape... like instead of welcome to testscape, i put welcome to progjex-scape And then i saved it. and then i clicked compile and then closed that and then clicked run server and opened up moparscape, and it didnt update... My steps i did edit... on client text pad... then find "welcome to" then change welcome to testscape to "welcome progjex-scape" Then i saved the text and compiled it and then ran moparscape. and it didnt update? And i tried run server. Whats the error???
My bat says this: [code] @echo on title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server run server[/code]

item.title: Noob help!
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

Client: Testscape

Well i did some updates on testscape…
like instead of welcome to testscape, i put welcome to progjex-scape
And then i saved it. and then i clicked compile and then closed that and then clicked run server and opened up moparscape, and it didnt update…
My steps i did
edit… on client text pad… then find “welcome to”
then change welcome to testscape to “welcome progjex-scape”
Then i saved the text and compiled it and then ran moparscape. and it didnt update? And i tried run server.
Whats the error???

My bat says this:

@echo on title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server run server

Read full topic
